titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for reforming sundry abuses in manufactures of silks and stuffs of forrain materials made here, or imported from forraign parts.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: ... Bagshot the fifth day of September, in the fourteenth yeer of His Majesties reign.
Arms 24; Steele notation: regula- rain 2) put 3) them, 4) confor- Pre-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
